title: Making dyes

properties.name: description
properties.value:
The profit rate assumes 1248 dyes per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed.
Making dyes involves getting the required ingredients:

Inputs (163,728)Outputs (360,672)
2,496 × Woad leaf (134,784)6,240 × Coins (6,240)48 × Energy potion(4) (22,704) (Optional)1,248 × Blue dye (360,672)

The profit rate assumes 1248 dyes per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed. Making dyes involves getting the required ingredients:

  • 2 woad leaves for blue dye
  • 2 onions for yellow dye
  • 3 redberries for red dye

and taking them to Aggie in Draynor Village. Additionally each dye costs 5 coins to make.

Dyes can be made faster by using the materials on Aggie, skipping some of the dialogue. The closest bank is in Draynor Village.

The inventory needs to be filled up with ingredients and coins to make the dye.

Using energy potions is recommended due to a lot of running involved.

Be sure to check the profits per dye on their respective wiki pages.

Caution: Always check the current prices in the Grand Exchange before committing to large batches.

and taking them to [[Aggie]] in [[Draynor Village]]. Additionally each dye costs 5 [[coins]] to make.

The inventory needs to be filled up with ingredients and coins to make the dye. 

Using energy potions is recommended due to a lot of running involved.

Be sure to check the profits per dye on their respective wiki pages.
